00020 void MC::Init()
00021 {
00022     reqH->mc = (Component*)this;
00023     bus->mc = (Component*)this;
00024     dram->mc = (Component*)this;
00025     responseH->mc = (Component*)this;
00026     refMgr->mc = (Component*)this;
00027 //    ni->mc = (Component*)this;
00028     reqH->parent = (Component*)ni;
00029     reqH->child  = (Component*)bus;
00030     bus->parent = (Component*)reqH;
00031     bus->child1 = (Component*)dram;     // dram link
00032     bus->child2 = (Component*)responseH; //response link        
00033     dram->parent = (Component*)bus; 
00034     responseH->parent = (Component*)bus;
00035     responseH->child = (Component*)ni;                  
00036     reqH->SetLinks();   // TODO need to fix these for parallel versions
00037     bus->SetLinks();    // No ptrs thrown here & there
00038     dram->SetLinks();   
00039     reqH->resPtr = (Component*)responseH;
00040     responseH->reqPtr = (Component*)reqH;               
00041     refMgr->reqPtr = reqH;
00042     
00043     StartRefresh();
00044     stats->mc = (Component*)this;       
00045     stats->InitStats(); 
00046 }
00047 
00048 void MC::StartRefresh()
00049 {
00050     refMgr->nextRefresh = static_cast<ullint>(REFRESH_INC);     
00051     IrisEvent *event = new IrisEvent();
00052     event->src = (Component*)this;
00053     event->dst = (Component*)refMgr;                    
00054     Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+refMgr->nextRefresh, &RefreshMgr::process_event, (RefreshMgr*)event->dst, event);      
00055 }
